Progres Pembangunan Sport Centre Kabupaten Cirebon Baru Mencapai 50 Persen

Progres Pembangunan Sport Centre Kabupaten Cirebon Baru Mencapai 50 Persen


KBRN, Cirebon : Sport Centre Watubelah Kabupaten Cirebon masih membutuhkan anggaran lebih dari 400 miliar rupiah agar pembangunannya bisa rampung 100 persen.Namun sayangnya, di APBD Kabupaten Cirebon tahun 2020 tidak teranggarkan, sehingga dikhawatirkan pembangunannya akan kembali mangkrak seperti sebelumnya.Hal itu terungkap saat Bupati Cirebon bersama unsur Forkompinda melakukan monitoring Pembangunan Sport Centre Watubelah, Rabu (6/11/2019) sore.Â Saat dikonfirmasi terkait hal tersebut, Bupati Cirebon Imron Rosyadi mengungkapkan, pihaknya akan mendorong kepada seluruh pihak baik itu DPRD maupun SKPD agar bisa menjalin Silaturahmi ke Provinsi maupun ke Pusat untuk membantu anggaran pembangunan Sport Centre, agar bisa rampung 100 persen dan bisa dipergunakan untuk menggelar pertandingan olahraga."Kalau melihat Stadion yang semegah ini tentunya anggarannya sangat besar, sementara anggaran dari APBD sangat terbatas. Saya minta SKPD untuk menjalin silaturahmi dengan Pemerintah Provinsi maupun Pusat agar menggelontorkan anggaran untuk pembangunan Sport Centre, sehingga bisa cepat selesai dan dipergunakan", ucap Imron Rosyadi kepada RRI.Sementara Wakil Ketua DPRD Kabupaten Cirebon Teguh Rusiana Merdeka sangat menyayangkan dengan perencanaan yang tidak dilakukan dengan baik, sehingga di tahun 2020 tidak teranggarkan di APBD Kabupaten Cirebon.DPRD pun siap untuk duduk bersama dan membahas terkait anggaran kelanjutan Pembangunan Sport Centre."Kalo memang tahun depan bisa dianggarkan ya kenapa tidak, tapi kalo memang tidak bisa kita cari permasalahannya dimana. Ayo kita duduk bersama, kita cari titik temunya, sehingga Sport Centre bisa cepat selesai", ungkap Teguh Rusiana Merdeka.Pembangunan Sport Centre di Kabupaten Cirebon yang dimulai sejak tahun 2011, saat ini progresnya sudah mencapai 50 persen, dimana pembangunan yang tahun ini memasuki tahap ke 6 sudah menghabiskan anggaran lebih dari 200 miliar rupiah.

Progress of Development of the New Cirebon Regency Sport Center Reaches 50 Percent
Nov 6, 2019, 23:01 by Alek Sunardi



Progress of Development of the New Cirebon Regency Sport Center Reaches 50 Percent



Progress of Development of the New Cirebon Regency Sport Center Reaches 50 Percent



Progress of Development of the New Cirebon Regency Sport Center Reaches 50 Percent


KBRN, Cirebon: Watubelah Sport Center Cirebon Regency still needs a budget of more than 400 billion rupiah so that its construction can be completed 100 percent. However, unfortunately in the Cirebon Regency Regional Budget in 2020 it is not budgeted, so it is feared the construction will return to stalling as before. That was revealed when the Regent Cirebon along with Forkompinda elements monitored the development of Watubelah Sport Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon. When confirmed regarding this matter, Cirebon Regent Imron Rosyadi revealed, his party would encourage all parties, both DPRD and SKPD, to be able to establish hospitality to the Province and to the Center to help the Sport Center development budget, so that it could be completed 100 percent and could be used to hold matches "If you look at such a grand stadium, of course the budget is very large, while the budget from the APBD is very limited. I ask the SKPD to establish a friendly relationship with the Provincial and Central Governments to pour out a budget for the construction of a Sport Center, so that it can be quickly finished and used," said Imron Rosyadi to RRI. Meanwhile Deputy Chairperson of Cirebon District Parliament Teguh Rusiana Merdeka regretted that the planning was not done well, so that in 2020 the budget was not budgeted in Cirebon Regency. The Regional Representative Council was ready to sit together and discuss related to the continuation budget of the Sport Cen Development tre. "If it's possible to budget for next year, why not, but if we can't find the problem where. Let's sit together, we look for a meeting point, so that the Sport Center can be quickly completed ", said Teguh Rusiana Merdeka. The Sport Center development in Cirebon Regency which began in 2011, currently the progress has reached 50 percent, where the development this year is entering the stage of this year. to 6 have already spent a budget of more than 200 billion rupiah.
